structure.unit: ARTICLE C. - PARADES, DEMONSTRATIONS AND STREET EVENTS

law.text: The terms picket, pickets and picketing as used herein are deemed to include "demonstrators," persons participating in vigils and any action primarily promoting or objecting to a policy upon those portions of the public ways not used primarily for vehicular parking and moving traffic and not constituting a parade. (Code 1959 , ยง15-35.1(j))
